title: FairCom Recognized in Gartner's 2015 Magic Quadrant for Operational Database Management Systems
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/26/2015 @ 6:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: FairCom 
COLUMBIA, MO -- (Marketwired) -- 10/26/15 -- FairCom , the pioneer in multimodel No+SQL integrated database management, today announced Gartner, Inc. has included it in its October 2015 Magic Quadrant for Operational Database Management Systems. The Quadrant analyzes vendors' ability to execute and completeness of vision. 
This marks two consecutive years of FairCom's placement on the Magic Quadrant. 
In the report Gartner states that "by 2017, all leading operational DBMSs will offer multiple data models, relational and NoSQL, in a single DBMS platform." This is a major advantage that FairCom customers have been experiencing for over a decade with c-treeACE. FairCom first offered the multimodel blend of NoSQL KVS and SQL back in the early 2000s, giving unprecedented transaction performance with full SQL access. 
"We believe this recognition is a testament to our customer driven focus; for 36 years, we've never lost our sight of who this technology is serving and how we're making their lives easier," said Alysha Brown, COO of FairCom. "It's no wonder that FairCom technology is used by 43% of Fortune 100 companies and we have customers who trust our solution enough to come back decade after decade." 
With customers in over 100 countries, FairCom's c-treeACE engine is the choice solution for enterprise data providing the most powerful simultaneous access to NoSQL and SQL. c-treeACE gives developers in companies of any size the control to customize their database -- structured or unstructured -- and ultimately enhance performance gains. It is the foundation for thousands of vertical market, embedded, and corporate applications worldwide, including UPS, IBM, Thomson Reuters and Visa. 
For the full Gartner Magic Quadrant for Operational Database Management Systems, FairCom is offering complementary access at http://learn.faircomcorp.com/2015-gartner-mq . 
About FairCom 
FairCom is a pioneer in the software industry, the first company to offer a commercial package using binary tree algorithms on microcomputers in 1979. Today, FairCom maintains its sole technical focus on database technology, continuously enhancing its core database technology while keeping up with the latest industry platforms and APIs. FairCom's c-treeACE engine is the industry's choice solution for enterprise data providing the most powerful simultaneous access to multimodel NoSQL and SQL, giving developers in companies of any size the control to customize their database, and ultimately enhancing performance gains. 
FairCom technology has been used in solutions serving industries including financial, healthcare, telecommunications, manufacturing automation, accounting, legal, dental, education, construction, aerospace, trucking, gaming, space exploration, oil and gas, energy, major league baseball, fraud detection, public safety and infrastructure management. 
FairCom is a privately owned company. For more details, please visit: www.FairCom.com
